Information.Name: dbtable
Information.RemoteMethods: get_data, get_structure, get_count, add_row, add_column, delete_column, delete_row, update_row, update_column

Language.Sentence: The Database table type produces an object representing a standard relational database.

Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
